heading: For New York
text: This is a zine that salutes independent businesses in New York.

about.heading: We Make Loans. Honestly.
about.text:
Bond Street is more than a loan provider - it’s a community, a promise to build real relationships, and a financial advocate to help you take the next big step for your business.

We are committed to helping the business owners that make NYC the best city in the world.
about.subhead: Bond Street supports some of NYC’s finest
